name: Numerikabrac @NumerikGames August 2018
description:
Video game "Cadavre exquis", created by the visitors of @NumerikGames festival in Yverdon-les-bains (CH). They draw us a lot of assets and we had to assemble them into some video game. This game is the raw result of this experience :D

Thanks to everybody who participated!

HOW TO PLAY:
Arrow keys to move around, space bar/ctrl left to jump. Gamepad is also supported.

COMMENT JOUER:
Touches fléchées pour se déplacer et la touche espace pour sauter. Vous pouvez aussi utiliser une manette de jeu.

Who is responsible for assembling all those awesome sweet artworks?

Meet the Dev, Maurizio Rigamonti

Meet the Photoshop Deep-Etcher guy, Wuthrer

NumerikGames official website

Music credits: Heatleybros
